text: I muli hua nia daangada ne hula gi daha mo synagogee, Paul mo Barnabas gu daudali go digau o Jew dogologo mo digau tuadimee dogologo ala ne hagadonu gaa huli ga daumaha gi taumaha digau o Jew. Meemaa ga helekai gi digaula, gu haga maaloo digaula bolo ginaadou gi mouli hua i lodo tumaalia dehuia a God.
